title: [Donation] Choose next charity
body:
Hello Tuskers,

We want to thank everyone that voted for our first donation last Monday on the telegram poll. The winner was Wild Tomorrow Fund, it was chosen out of 3 charities.

This proposal is to choose the next charity that will receive the community donation.

1 - C.R.O.W : https://www.crowngo.org

C.R.O.W. is a Non-Profit organization registered 501(c)(3) in the US; our mission as an International, Educational Institution is to establish and train Rangers to a set standard in the skills necessary to support, train, and supplement anti-poaching and conservation efforts worldwide.

It was part of the first 3 choices on the first donation.

2 - Elephant Action League (Earth League International) : https://earthleagueinternational.org

Earth League International (formerly Elephant Action League) is an innovative non-governmental organization that fights environmental/wildlife crime by merging the worlds of conservation, intelligence, analysis, whistleblowing and media production.

It was part of the first 3 choices on the first donation.

3 - Izindlovu : https://izindlovu.org

“Indlovu” means “Elephant” in Zulu. As elephants have a strong family structure, we wanted to capture the importance of this bond in the name of our fund so we choose the word “Izindlovu” which means “Elephants”.

Izindlovu Fund vzw is a 100% non-profit organisation, founded by Ben Van Hool and Helen Van Hulle in Belgium for the benefit of conserving the African Elephant.

It seems that they only accept BTC, but we will contact them to see if they would accept ETH donations.



Vote for the charity of your choice with your $TUSK ! At the end of the vote, the winner will be announced on telegram.
author: 0x0e3769bdCCb5b1840823a202c08A872fCD0e3dEC
